casebody.data:
A. J. SIMLER v. SISTERS OF ST. FRANCIS, a Corporation. No. 5036. United States Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Dec. 21, 1954. James E. Grigsby, Phil E. Daugherty, Oklahoma City, Okl., and Conner, Hil-pirt & Britton, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellant. J. B. Dudley and Fred E. Suits, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellee.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and KNOUS, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on motion of appellant.
